name: Giant Recruit
flavor: A giant fighter undergoing borrowed armor.

features.name: Minion (7) - Passive
features.desc: The Recruit is defeated when they take any damage. For every 7 damage a PC deals to the Recruit, defeat an additional Minion within range the attack would succeed against.

features.name: Group Attack - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Giant Recruits within Close range of them. Those Minions move into Melee range of the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 5 physical damage each. Combine this damage.
